headline: Aptiv Named One of the World’s Most Ethical Companies for the 13th Consecutive Year
summary: SCHAFFHAUSEN, Switzerland, March 12, 2025--Aptiv PLC (NYSE: APTV), a leading global technology company focused on making the world safer, greener, and more connected, today announced that it has been named one of the World's Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere, a global leader in defining and advancing the standards of ethical business practices.
